full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LJON LEGS RGYAL PO LA SOGS PA RNAL 'BYOR PA'I PHYI NANG DNGOS PO BSRUNG ZHING SKYONG BA'I DKOR BDAG RNAMS LA GTOR MA 'BUL TSUL DON KUN 'GRUB PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES LJON LEGS RGYAL PO LA SOGS PA RNAL 'BYOR PA'I PHYI NANG DNGOS PO BSRUNG ZHING SKYONG BA'I DKOR BDAG RNAMS, @004A *, ,LA GTOR 'BUL, TSUL DON KUN 'GRUB PA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DE LTA SNYIGS MA'I GANG ZAG LA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS SNYAM BSAM STE RANG GI SEMS LA SOGS SU GYUR TE BHA SU KU AARTHA SIDHI MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,)
